name: primitive TD
description:
Its a simple tower defense game  where that I only use some basic shape to create.

Controls

B build button toggle

Esc cancel some UI 

left mouse button  to select

right mouse button to cancel

shift show HP

alt show tower attack range or aura effect range

Tower Types

offensive tower resource tower and aura tower

if there anything you think could make this game better plz do comment it bellow.
